text: Kaadu qilmi kah yontocowwime maray addunyaa kee akeerak asmat-le, booley, siinih yan finqaw! Maabinaay Yallak meesita keenik iyye, Yallal yeemeneeh meqe taama abe marah Yallih galto (jannat kinnuk) tayse akeeral, addunyal Qhaaruunuh yontocowwime maaluk, kaadu ama fayu (nasaacatta) oggoltaah elle taamittam matan Yallih taaqatal yisbireeh, umaanek yexxeere mara akke waytek
